amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that the Federal Government may not pay anyone less than $10.10 an hour.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds may be used to pay any individual at an annual rate of Grade 1, Steps 1,2,3,4,5, or 6; or Grade 2 Step 1 or 2 as defined in the "Salary Table 2014-GS" and to prohibit the use of funds to pay any individual at an hourly basic rate of Grade 1, Steps 1,2,3,4,5, or 6; or Grade 2, Step 1 or 2.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 230 (Roll no. 417).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 230 (Roll no. 417).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Grayson.
